scripts.dev: concurrently "cd app1; npm run dev " "cd app2; npm run dev" "cd container; npm run dev "
scripts.build: concurrently "cd app1; npm run build " "cd app2; npm run build" "cd container; npm run build "
scripts.start: concurrently "cd app1; npm run start " "cd app2; npm run start" "cd container; npm run start "
